sentences.en: Applying the dye can be messy, particularly on long hair.
sentences.cn: 涂抹染发剂可能会搞得一团糟，特别是长发。

sentences.en: Be particularly fastidious about washing your hands before touching food.
sentences.cn: 接触食物前尤其对洗手不能有半点马虎。

sentences.en: British farmers, particularly those producing lamb, are very worried.
sentences.cn: 英国农场主，尤其是养羊羔的农场主，非常担忧。

sentences.en: Except for her illnesses, she had had a particularly happy childhood.
sentences.cn: 除了体弱多病外，她的童年特别幸福。

sentences.en: He did not particularly want to take up a competitive sport.
sentences.cn: 他并不特别想从事竞技体育运动。

sentences.en: I often do absent-minded things, particularly when I'm worried.
sentences.cn: 我常做些心不在焉的事，尤其是在我焦虑不安时。

sentences.en: I particularly like the type of shelving that screws to the wall.
sentences.cn: 我尤其喜欢那种用螺钉固定在墙上的搁板。

sentences.en: Keep your office space looking good, particularly your desk.
sentences.cn: 保持办公环境的整洁，尤其是你的桌子。

sentences.en: Liver and kidney are particularly rich in vitamin A.
sentences.cn: 肝脏和肾脏富含维生素A。

sentences.en: More local employment will be created, particularly in service industries.
sentences.cn: 当地会创造出更多的就业机会，尤其是服务行业。

sentences.en: Some of the instrumentation is exquisite, particularly for harp and flute.
sentences.cn: 有些器乐段落谱写得非常优美，尤其是竖琴和长笛的部分。

sentences.en: Steve was in a particularly bad mood when he got back.
sentences.cn: 史蒂夫回来时情绪特别不好。

sentences.en: The children give her hell, particularly the older boys.
sentences.cn: 这些孩子让她吃足了苦头，特别是那些年龄大一点的男孩子。

sentences.en: The economy of the province was atypical because it was particularly small.
sentences.cn: 该省的经济比较特殊，因为它的规模特别小。

sentences.en: The restaurant is particularly popular with young people.
sentences.cn: 那家餐厅尤其受到年轻人的欢迎。

sentences.en: The union is particularly concerned at the sourcing of products abroad.
sentences.cn: 该联盟尤其关注海外的产品货源。

sentences.en: Their 4-1 win in Honduras was a particularly lively affair.
sentences.cn: 他们在洪都拉斯以4比1获胜的那场比赛尤其激动人心。

sentences.en: These figures were often spuriously computed by selecting particularly favorable sample groups.
sentences.cn: 这些数字往往是用错误的方法计算出来的，所用的都是特别挑选出来的对自己有利的样本组。

sentences.en: We are hoping to expand our business, particularly in Europe.
sentences.cn: 我们希望扩大业务，尤其是在欧洲。

words.tran_cn: 特别的；详细的；独有的；挑剔的
特殊神宠论；完全忠于一种理论
特别地，独特地；详细地，具体地；明确地，细致地

trans.tran_en: more than usual or more than others
